title: From Our Home Correspondent 19/11/17
content: Mishal Husain presents pieces on a Devon pub admired by Prince Harry, why the future for local papers matters, executive pay and a moment of truth for a woman with breast cancer.
contentSnippet: Mishal Husain presents pieces on a Devon pub admired by Prince Harry, why the future for local papers matters, executive pay and a moment of truth for a woman with breast cancer.

itunes.author: BBC Radio 4
itunes.subtitle: A moment of truth with breast cancer and a Devon pub admired by Prince Harry is for sale
